pr_title: [FLINK-20673][table-planner-blink] ExecNode#getOutputType method should return LogicalType instead of RowType

timeline.bodyText: You can link to JavaDoc of RowData for a mapping of logical types to internal data structures here.
timeline.author: twalthr

timeline.message: [FLINK-20673][table-planner-blink] ExecNode#getOutputType method should return LogicalType instead of RowType
